fields.comment: Should we tell the City of Vancouver to resolve this issue?
Mayor Robertson is aware of the issue and is onboard about a fix
This can't be, the elevator hasn't been made yet!
This is a problem. I really want to eat some cheap Asian food on campus.
UBC Facilities here. We are aware of the issue and are working on a fix.
The new ramp is acceptable, but a new elevator would have been better.
